title: Why does Riot keep creating new champions when all of the current ones aren't usable?
body: There are several champions that are still broken - Poppy, Yorick, and Urgot just to name a few, yet none of them have been fixed, yet all I see is new champions and reworks of champions that were at least playable in the meta (Garen, Darius, Fiora, Skarner). I don't understand why Yorick hasn't been worked on. It's a mystery to me honestly.

I rarely see any of those champs but I think I read up somewhere about a Poppy, Ryze and Yorick rework in the works from one of the rioters that work in the champion design team on the forums.

Because those champs are protected by the fact so little people play them that a rework would only attract people to play the champion (as if it were a new champ release), thus wasting time by having haters give non-constructive criticism on the boards, while not giving as much hype.

I can understand Taric, if used correctly he can be devastating.

But Yorick and Urgot? I only play Yorick because he can push lanes extremely easily early game, but with no real escape you must either utilise his early game or suffer late game. That being said, if you can force his hand early, make him use mana he is not intending to use, he will not be able to farm the way he should and therefore lose early and late.

I can't say much on Urgot, I haven't seen him in a real game for a long time and don't watch much stuff at high levels, but a rework would be good, maybe he will be played more at lower levels.

i think riot wont touch urgot after adding the mana to his shield. its one of the laziest changes ive seen but at least hes got his own nice little niche. ive heard poppy rework is coming and also a yorick one too. im hoping for a taric one, just cos i consider him so bad for the game (armor aura....stun....heal....52% winrate) i think everyone would rather the option of MORE champs rather than potentially broken ones getting slightly better. rito would also rather people spend 975rp on all that effort over possibly 450 IP on poppy, because even then new people can still buy poppy AND the new champ. its a win win for rito and pretty much anyone that isnt poppy
